ygData.subject: Emulators
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone! Just wanna ask, does anyone here play with emulators? I suddenly have the urge to play with some old classic games. Have been searching some
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone! Just wanna ask, does anyone here play with emulators? I
suddenly have the urge to play with some old classic games. Have been
searching some emulator websites but cant find them. If you have the
following emulator pls email them to me(shouldnt be too big) thanks

Nintendo/familycom(those 8 bit ones)

Konami World-One of the best games created at that time(1980s) I found it
on one website, but its faulty :( everytime I use the teleport to get back
to the lab the graphics go crazy. Anyone got a working copy?

Legend of Zelda:the advantures of Link-This is not Legend of link. Legend
of link is part 1 this is part 2

DragonballZ 2-The RPG game...


Sega MegaDrive

Herzog Zwei-Strangely, although its a popular game, there isnt any game
which is similar to it right now.

Bahamut Wars-A Fantasy War game. Donno name correct anot since its in
Japanese. The cover of the game is a Dragon with a rider on it. Title is in
Japanese but it ends with the chinese character Zhan Ji(War history).
Game has 8 characters+1 hidden char to choose from and is for 1-4 players
with the others play by computer.

If anyone links to emulator websites pls email to me too. Setting up a
links page for them :p
Thanks in advance!
